entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow or rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this morning then changing to periods of rain this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain early this morning. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Temperature rising to 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 10 mm. Temperature rising to 10 by morning. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers early in the afternoon then 40 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 late in the afternoon. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
